schema.description: TaskMaster AI PRD Lifecycle Tracking Schema

fields.title: Human-readable PRD title
fields.filePath: Current file path relative to project root
fields.linkedTaskIds: Array of task IDs generated from this PRD

statusTransitions.pending_to_inprogress: When first linked task changes to 'in-progress'
statusTransitions.inprogress_to_done: When ALL linked tasks reach 'done' status (100% completion)
statusTransitions.manual_override: Allow manual status changes with validation and audit trail
statusTransitions.rollback_protection: Prevent status regression without explicit user confirmation
